shortdesc.ph: Removes the spatial position information of the specified remote user.
Removes the spatial position information of a specified remote user.

section.p: After calling this method, the local user will no longer hear the specified remote user. After leaving the channel, to avoid wasting computing resources, it is recommended to call this method to remove the spatial position information of the remote user; otherwise, the information will be retained. When the number of remote users exceeds the maximum number of audio streams that can be received as set by , the system will automatically unsubscribe from the audio stream of the farthest user based on relative distance.

After successfully calling this method, you will no longer hear the specified remote user's voice. After leaving the channel, to avoid wasting computing resources, it is recommended to call this method to remove the spatial position information of the specified remote user. Otherwise, the user's spatial position information will be retained. When the number of remote users exceeds the number of audio streams that can be received as set by , the system will automatically unsubscribe from the audio stream of the farthest user based on relative distance.

plentry.pd: uid. This value must be the same as the user ID passed in when the user joined the channel.
uid. This parameter must be the same as the user ID passed in when the user joined the channel.
